body:
Hi, I'm SBMous.

Here's some facts about me (Don't worry, you don't need to read them if you don't want to):
I'm 13 and live in the south of the UK
My favorite gaming platform is PC (I Have an XBox 360 but never use it)
My internet is pretty slow (250 kbps - 1 Mbps)
I use a Fujitsu Lifebook at one house and an HP the other (Will confirm Model)
I am not rich enough to have two houses, my parents are divorced. (It's actually pretty good, double Christmas and birthday!!!)
I own many many steam games (around 50)
My total time on team games is nearing 1000 hours, and they're my least played.
I have played Minecraft since 1.2.5 came out
I have been gaming since I was 6 (ish)
I love cookies and cake
I am a huge JackScepticEye fan
I also love Etho (So sad about the lack of uploads recently)
My favorite Avicus game mode is Nebula (Closely followed by Control the Hill)
I prefer DTM to CTW

Ok, that concludes the list of facts about me you don't really care about or need to know.

Feel free to Ask anything, I'll try to reply to all questions.
See you around!
       SBMous

title: SBMous - Joining the Community - AMA

fav food?

Favourite Colour: Blue, Royal Blue
Favourite Food: Bacon
Best thing that ever happened to me: I don't really know... Probably the fact that I have never had a serious injury in my life, not one.

Thanks for welcoming me!

replies.body:
I do Other Video Games... :P
But seriously, I do Archery 2 and a half hours a week, 1 hour of cricket every week (Game Tomorrow, wish me luck :P) and I do this thing called Dungeon World, basically a new D&D. I also do a lot of coding and stuff in my spare time, I really want to learn a lot and do game development.
